20101224161351.000|20101224161353.000|CC1|DON'T DOCTOR CAN WRITE A        
20101224161353.000|20101224161354.000|CC1|PRESCRIPTION FOR SOMETHING A    
20101224161354.000|20101224161354.000|CC1|LITTLE STRONGER.                
20101224161354.000|20101224161355.000|CC1|IT YOU'RE SUFFERING FROM THIS

20101224161401.000|20101224161403.000|CC1|WORKING YOU YOU NEED TO SEE YOUR
20101224161403.000|20101224161404.000|CC1|DOCTOR.                         
20101224161404.000|20101224161405.000|CC1|>> AND SOMETHING LIKE 15 MILLION
20101224161405.000|20101224161408.000|CC1|HAVE MORE CHRONIC HEARTBURN,    
20101224161408.000|20101224161409.000|CC1|ACID REFLUX PROBLEM, AND THAT   
20101224161409.000|20101224161411.000|CC1|CAN ACTUALLY CONTRIBUTE TO MORE 
20101224161411.000|20101224161414.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT ISSUES AS FAR AS    
20101224161414.000|20101224161414.000|CC1|HEALTH GOES?                    
20101224161414.000|20101224161415.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20101224161415.000|20101224161416.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT JUST A PROBLEM WE   
20101224161416.000|20101224161417.000|CC1|SNEE PEOPLE AS THEY AGE.        
20101224161417.000|20101224161419.000|CC1|IT CAN BE SEEN IN CHILDREN.     
20101224161419.000|20101224161420.000|CC1|IT CAN BE SEEN IN PREGNANT      
20101224161420.000|20101224161421.000|CC1|WOMEN.                          
20101224161421.000|20101224161422.000|CC1|THIS IS PRIDDY WIDESPREAD AND   
20101224161422.000|20101224161424.000|CC1|THE REAL CONCERN IS THAT IF THIS
20101224161424.000|20101224161427.000|CC1|PROBLEM GOES UNTREATED, THE     
20101224161427.000|20101224161430.000|CC1|EXPOSURE OF THE ACID TO YOUR

20101224161439.000|20101224161443.000|CC1|ANYTHING FROM ASTHMA, COUGH,
